page.title: 10REMEMBRANCE DAY - RELIGION.
page.content: RELIGION, REMEMBRANCE DAY AND TWINNING. There are a number of {churches}in the town of{differing {denominations.}There are{special {occasions}when they{come together}such as{Remembrance Sunday}which is the always the{nearest Sunday to 11th. {November.}It is a{day when thanks are {given}for{peace}and{in remembrance}of {those who gave their lives in the two {World Wars}of the 20th. Century. An {open air Service of Remembrance}is held at the{Cenotaph}when members of all the{churches,}and many{other {organiations hold a joint service.}For the past two or three years{officials and{friends}from our{twin town in {France}have travelled to{Kenilworth to{take part}in the same{service and {ceremony. Officially Remembrance Day is the{11th. hour}of the{11th. day}of the{11th. month}of the{year.
